column5: Historic meets modern in this 400 square foot guest cottage in Southtown San Antonio. 2 blocks from Southtown restaurants/shops/art and downtown's Hemisfair Park, La Villita and The Alamo. 5 minute walk to the convention center too. Enjoy First Friday, Fiesta and so much more. Small pool and outdoor dining space with gas grill too.
column8: Enchanting Southtown San Antonio guest cottage
